mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE UserID=#{UserID} order by OrderID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (OrderID, UserID, OrderName, UserName, Email, RodeAddress, HouseAddress, DetailAddress, PhoneNumber, PayMethod, OrderTime, TotalPrice, Requested, OrderState, paymethodcard, paymethodnumber, PostNumber) VALUES (#{OrderID}, #{UserID}, #{OrderName}, #{UserName}, #{Email}, #{RodeAddress}, #{HouseAddress}, #{DetailAddress}, #{PhoneNumber}, #{PayMethod}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{TotalPrice}, #{Requested}, #{OrderState}, #{paymethodcard}, #{paymethodnumber}, #{PostNumber})
